content: Was it created with Thunderbird running in dark mode? Have you seen https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-android-import ?
creator: wsmwk

content:
Hello, Thanks for your answer. Unfortunately dark mode doesn't change anything. I wish you a good day.

Alain Le Métayer France
creator: lemetayeralain

content:
Wayne Mery said
Was it created with Thunderbird running in dark mode? Have you seen https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-android-import ?
creator: jfeatherstone642

content:
I read several times https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-android-import But, even in dark mode nothing changes. The problem is  : 1. "Scan the QR code from Thunderbird Desktop" 2. "Align the QR code provided from Thunderbird Desktop" → nothing happens. There is no alignment occurring, even in dark mode. Sorry to bother you with my beginner questions.

Alain France
creator: lemetayeralain
